title: FS: Dietsche Cobb, HM Taylor Cobb
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: FS: Dietsche Cobb, HM Taylor Cobb
posts.post_content:
No longer interested in postcards so wanted to give this site a first crack:

Dietsche Cobb PSA 4: sold
HM Taylor Cobb SGC 10: $3900 - bottom right corner crease makes up the grade, but card is extremely presentable for the grade

Please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if interested for more scans (because these scans aren't great), thanks!

Great PCs Pete. I love those early Cobbs. 

But that's why it's good to post pics. I'm sure it was just a slip up but there's a decent sized $ difference between an SGC 4 and PSA 4 

GLWS
one last bump and price cut before auction.

[quote name="sportscardpete" post=1980125]one last bump and price cut before auction.[/QUOTE]
Still for sale? PM me!
What’s the story here Pete?  are any of these cards available?
Howdy. For some reason this thread came out from the dead (posted months ago) but nope the Dietsche is gone and I’m keeping the HM Taylor unless I can use that towards an m101-3 or Dietsche fielding
